title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not wrapping and it should have the same background color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be smaller. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview should wrap, and its background color should match the hover color.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Check the marking between the button and the list. 3. Observe the alignment of the top button. 4. Look for a label in the table. 5. Try selecting multiple items. 6. Examine the signature preview and compare its background color to the hover color.
